fr.eikasus.objectsmyfriends.model.dal.implementations

Class ItemDAOImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.eikasus.objectsmyfriends.model.dal.implementations.GenericDAOImpl<Item,java.lang.Long>
      • fr.eikasus.objectsmyfriends.model.dal.implementations.ItemDAOImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GenericDAO<Item,java.lang.Long>, ItemDAO

    @ApplicationScoped
 @ItemDAODB
public class ItemDAOImpl
extends GenericDAOImpl<Item,java.lang.Long>
implements ItemDAO
    Class used to implement the item data access object.

    This class supplies all the necessary methods to handle item objects within the data access layer. It is supplied by the DAO factory object and used by its corresponding manager.

    This is the implementation for database.

    See Also:
    findByCriteria(User, UserRole, Search, Category, String), deleteByCriteria(User, UserRole, Search, Category, String)

    • Method Detail

      • findByCriteria

        public java.util.List<Item> findByCriteria(User user,
                                           UserRole role,
                                           @NotNull
                                           @NotNull Search search,
                                           Category category,
                                           java.lang.String keywords)
                                    throws ModelException
        Search items using criteria.

        This method search items according to criteria supplied in parameter. The relation between each criterion is a logical and. Except the user and its role, all other parameters can be null.

        Specified by:
        findByCriteria in interface ItemDAO
        Parameters:
        user - User to search for.
        role - Role of the supplied user (seller or buyer)
        search - Searching criteria.
        category - Category of items searched.
        keywords - Keywords on item name.
        Returns:
        List of items found.
        Throws:
        ModelException - In case of pb.

      • deleteByCriteria

        public void deleteByCriteria(User user,
                             UserRole role,
                             @NotNull
                             @NotNull Search search,
                             Category category,
                             java.lang.String keywords)
                      throws ModelException
        Delete items using criteria.

        This method delete items according to criteria supplied in parameter. The relation between each criterion is a logical and. Except the user and its role, all other parameters can be null.

        NO PERSISTENCE CONTEXT SHOULD BE ACTIVE TO USE THIS METHOD.

        Specified by:
        deleteByCriteria in interface ItemDAO
        Parameters:
        user - User to search for.
        role - Role of the supplied user (seller or buyer)
        search - Searching criteria.
        category - Category of items searched.
        keywords - Keywords on item name.
        Throws:
        ModelException - In case of pb.
